XPS Pensions Group PLC is a UK-based pensions consulting and administration business, providing services to over 1,400 pension schemes.
Zigup Plc is an integrated mobility solutions platform offering vehicle rental, fleet management, accident management, and repair services across the UK, Ireland, and Spain.
